## Brief Description
Transport Canada requires the procurement of test equipment for evaluating active safety systems. The requirement includes the purchase of one rear-end vehicle target, one parking assistance test kit, and one child presence detection dummy, along with ancillary items. This procurement aims to meet the needs of Transport Canada, as outlined in the Statement of Work (Annex A) dated 2023-07-13 and described in Annex B - Pricing.

## Technical Specifications
The procurement is categorized under UNSPSC 25191800, Vehicle testing and measuring equipment. The Government of Canada reserves the right to specify technical requirements.

## Procurement Method and Selection Criteria
This solicitation is a request for proposals (RFP) using a competitive, open-bidding process. The contract will be awarded to the bidder submitting the lowest bid, as per the selection criteria specified in the solicitation document.

## Participating Countries
This procurement is open to the countries listed under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Important Details

*   Bidders must submit their proposals and supporting documentation by 14:00 EST on September 6, 2023. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
*   The estimated contract value is not specified in this solicitation announcement. Bidders must review the solicitation package for detailed information.
